attributes.action: Petion to stop the petition for a 2nd Eu referendum
attributes.additional_details: Over 17 million british people voted to leave the EU. A clear win for the british people. We need to get control back for our country as the last generation has handed it on a plate to the EU. We will have our ruff time times but our country will come back stronger than ever as we have always done.
attributes.background: We the English people are petioning to stop the petion for a 2 nd Eu referendum as the english people have spoken 1.3 million more vote to leave this is fair
